sen.j: 園池司（えんちし）は律令制において宮内省に属する機関の一つである。
sen.e: Enchishi is one of the institutions belonging to Kunaisho (Ministry of the Sovereign's Household) in the Ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code).

Enchishi (Gardens and Ponds Office) was one of the institutions belonging to Kunaisho (Ministry of the Sovereign's Household) in the Ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code).
sen.cmt: Enchishiの補足追加 (参照: http://www.unterstein.net/or/docs/JapanRanks.pdf)、is→wasに修正
sen.e: Enchishi (Gardens and Ponds Office) was one of the institutions belonging to Kunaisho (Ministry of the Sovereign's Household) in the Ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code).

sen.j: 園池司は離宮・庭園の管理と供御としての野菜の生産を行っていた。
sen.e: Enchishi administered rikyu (an imperial villa) and gardens, and produced vegetables as kugo (emperor's meal).
Enchishi administered rikyu (an imperial villa) and gardens, and produced vegetables as kugo (emperor's meal).
Enchishi administered rikyu (an imperial villa) and gardens, and produced vegetables as kugo (emperor's meal).

sen.j: 「園地」は令の一編である田令に記載された土地の一形態で野菜・果物をつくっていたと考えられる。
sen.e: "Enchi" was one form of the land described in Denryo (the law about providing rice fields), which was one of ryo (administrative code), and Enchishi is considered to have produced vegetables and fruits.
sen.cmt: 「園地」は「園池」の間違いと取りました。
sen.e: "Enchi" was one form of the land described in Denryo (the law about providing rice fields), which was one of ryo (administrative code), and Enchishi is considered to have produced vegetables and fruits.

"Enchi" was one form of the land described in Denryo (the law about providing rice fields), which was one of ryo (administrative code), and Enchishi is considered to have produced vegetables and fruits.

sen.j: その実態は不明であるが､園池司はこのような園地の管理も行ったらしい。
sen.e: The situation is not clear, but enchishi controlled such a enchi, too.
The situation is not clear, but Enchishi controlled such a enchi, too.
The situation is not clear, but Enchishi controlled such a enchi, too.

sen.j: また珍獣の飼育も職掌の一つであったらしい。
sen.e: To upkeep rare animals seems to have been one of its official duties.
To upkeep rare animals seems to have been one of its official duties.
To upkeep rare animals seems to have been one of its official duties.

sen.j: 似たような官司に花苑司（かえんし）があるがこれは短期間設置されただけあり､また名称などから考えるに庭園管理に特化したものではないかと考えられる。
sen.e: There was Kaenshi, who was a similar government official, but it was set up only for a short time and considering the name, the duty was considered to have been specialized in the management of gardens.

There was Kaenshi, who was a similar government official, but it was set up only for a short time and considering the name, the duty was considered to have been specialized in the management of gardens.

There was Kaenshi, who was a similar government official, but it was set up only for a short time and considering the name, the duty was considered to have been specialized in the management of gardens.

sen.j: 寛平八年（896年）内膳司に併合された。
sen.e: It was incorporated into Naizenshi (Imperial Table Office) in 896.
It was incorporated into Naizenshi (Imperial Table Office) in 896.
It was incorporated into Naizenshi (Imperial Table Office) in 896.

sen.j: この頃には専ら野菜の栽培をしていたのだろう。
sen.e: At that time it might exclusively grow vegetables.
At that time it might exclusively grow vegetables.
It suggests that they probably grew mainly vegetables at that time.
Okimi (corresponding to Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) and Shohachi-i (Senior Eighth Rank)) one member.
Kami (director) (corresponding to Shorokuinojo [Senior Sixth Rank, Upper Grade]) one member.
sen.cmt: Okimi→Kamiに修正、補足追加「従六位正六位」→リンク先の単語と混ざっているため、ウェブ記載の「正六位上」を転記・訳文を修正しました。
sen.e: Kami (director) (corresponding to Shorokuinojo [Senior Sixth Rank, Upper Grade]) one member.
Jo (secretary) (corresponding to Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) and Jushichii (Junior Seventh Rank)) one member.
Jo (secretary) (corresponding to Jushichiinoge [Junior Seventh Rank, Lower Grade]) one member.
sen.cmt: 「従六位従七位」→リンク先の単語と混ざっているため、ウェブ記載の「従七位下」を転記・訳文を修正しました。
sen.e: Jo (secretary) (corresponding to Jushichiinoge [Junior Seventh Rank, Lower Grade]) one member.

sen.j: 令史（大初位下相当）一名
sen.e: Reishi (corresponding to Jurokui and Daishoi (Great Initial Rank)) one member.
Reishi (corresponding to Daihatsuinoge [Greater Initial Rank, Lower Grade]) one member.
sen.cmt: 「従六位大初位」→リンク先の単語と混ざっているため、ウェブ記載の「大初位下」を転記・訳文を修正しました。
sen.e: Reishi (corresponding to Daihatsuinoge [Greater Initial Rank, Lower Grade]) one member.
Kanjin Zonin (lower-ranking government official) newly established.
Kanjin Zonin (lower-ranking government official) newly established.
